name: Gmail display address next to name
description:
Show full address next to each name.
Enable whitespace wrap to show all addresses in several lines.
additional_info:
Took a rule of this style http://userstyles.org/styles/76868/gmail-display-full-address-with-name and added the 'several lines' rule.
Reversed the rule to apply only to mails (and stop making chats unreadable).
Fixed: was not showing From address.
